description:
This is a course for people who (like myself) love taking pictures and adding something to make the picture even more beautiful. In this course, I cover all the techniques a photographer needs in Photoshop. Varying from using Camera Raw, replacing skies, digital blending, shooting into the sun, HDR, Layers, Masks and Blending Modes, Black and Whites, Panoramas, Removing elements, Special Effects and Printing. This complete course of over 5 hours of training, with over 40 Raw files is necessary for all photographers.

This step by step course is very easy to follow and will give you a lot of facility in retouching your future photographies.

Compatible with Photoshop CS4, CS5, CS6 & CC
title: Photoshop for Photographers
